description: Try your hand at different ways to play in this downloadable set available for a special price! This set includes the  popular three-player Mahjong (Standard/Kansai/Kyoto rule sets), the fun and exciting 3-player Hanafuda, brain-crunching Shisen Mahjong Solitaire, 500 one-move Shogi problems, and 150 three-move Shogi problems.
name: Deluxe Up Grade Kit
